summary: UI and index.html were updated to reference a stable logo path and new favicon/app-icon links, but the required static image assets (logo file and generated icon variants) are not shown as added/updated in the diff. Additionally, an unrequested coins icon asset reference and an incorrect extra feature request entry appear in the changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the uploaded image file (1771343232477.png) to the frontend static assets under a stable path in frontend/public, accessible via /assets/... URL.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI now references a stable path (/assets/branding/ncw-logo.png), but the diff shows no added files under frontend/public (Added: 0), so the actual logo asset copy/rename is not evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and include logo-derived icon variants in frontend/public/assets/generated with exact filenames: ncw-app-icon.dim_512x512.png, ncw-app-icon.dim_192x192.png, ncw-favicon.dim_32x32.png.
missing_requirements.reason: frontend/index.html references these files, but the diff shows no added static assets (Added: 0) and no evidence that these images exist in frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/used a coins icon image at /assets/generated/coins-icon.dim_512x512.png in the header.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to add the NCW logo and logo-derived favicon/app-icon variants; it did not request introducing a new coins icon asset reference.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a new pending request entry to remove/delete previously published versions/releases.
hallucinated_features.reason: This contradicts the stated Non-goal: "Deleting or removing previously published versions/releases." The change appears as a new_feature_requests item in project_state.json.
evidence: project_state.json (new_feature_requests: AR-1 "Remove/delete previously published versions/releases as requested by user")
